{"step_by_step_thinking": "In a relaxed state, the chest wall and lung recoil are balanced at the functional residual capacity (FRC). Minute volume refers to the total volume of air moved in and out of the lungs per minute, and it does not represent the balance between chest wall and lung recoil.
